summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue Northeast and Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Sixty-fifth Street to East Seventy-third Street, by constructing an eight (8) inch water main therein; and East Seventy-third Street, from Eighteenth Avenue Northeast to Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, by constructing a two (2) inch water main therein, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 34882, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
